hotels.name: Goa Paradise
hotels.description: Luxurious hotel in Goa offering modern amenities, serene ambiance, and proximity to beaches, perfect for relaxation and adventure.

amenities.name: Wi-Fi
amenities.description: Free high-speed Wi-Fi available in all rooms and public areas.

amenities.name: Pool
amenities.description: Outdoor pool with a relaxing lounge area and poolside bar.

amenities.name: Gym
amenities.description: 24/7 access to fully equipped fitness center with modern equipment.

amenities.name: Spa
amenities.description: Luxurious spa offering massages, facials, and relaxation therapies.

amenities.name: Restaurant
amenities.description: Gourmet dining options with both local and international cuisines.

amenities.name: Business Center
amenities.description: Fully equipped business center with computers, printers, and meeting rooms.

amenities.name: Parking
amenities.description: Secure on-site parking with valet service and electric vehicle charging stations.

amenities.name: Airport Shuttle
amenities.description: Complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport.

rules: Valid ID proof required at check-in.
Pets are allowed on request.
Unmarried couples are allowed.

bankOffer.details: Pay using HDFC Credit Card EMI to avail the offer.
